transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji. Haan ji Shubham Govind baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se account manager.
Customer: Ji ji ji bataye.
Executive: Ji us time last time baat hua tha na aapka mere se to aap bata rahe the kuch ki matlab aisa aap puchna refund vagaira ke related.
Customer: Haan ji baat hui thi.
Executive: Hai na to haan haan vahi maine to fir aapki jaise ye jo jinhone on board karaya tha ye Surjan Lal Meena hai inka bhi phone aaya tha aapke paas?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ye kya keh rahe the matlab?
Customer: Wo dekhiye convince karna chah rahe the ki aap rukiye koshish kijiye aisa hai vaisa hai.
Executive: Haan main samajh gaya.
Customer: Okay to matlab aap batao fir aap lekin.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ji bataye.
Executive: Matlab aapka man fir kya hai matlab aap kahenge to fir main ek baar senior se baat kara dunga sari cheeze ki agar rahega kyuki ye hai na 60 days ke agar rehta hai beech andar to jo bhi jaise newly on board karate hain jaise Surjan Lal Meena vagaira hai.
Executive: To inke upar hi matlab us cheez ka wo rehta hai ki aapke through ye jo hai na case refund gaya hai to aap samajh rahe matlab unke upar responsibility rahegi inki Surjan Lal Meena jo hai na aise karke matlab process rahe to abhi aapko 60 days hue nahi hai matlab aapko aisa lag raha hai ki nahi milega business is cheez mein.
Executive: Hai na to main ek bari baat karwa du aapki.
Customer: Thik hai aap baat karwa de.
Executive: Karwaun to ek minute ruko.
Executive: Sir thik hai main call karta hu. Ye hai na ek click hai na aapka niche aur ye ye aaya tha sir ka case to hai na to inko na matlab ek mahine ke bhitar keh rahe hain by lead bhi itni hui to bhi like 60 days hue hi nahi hai na to ye matlab ek glitch puchh lijiye inko process.
Executive: Aur ye sab.
Executive: Thik hai sir call karo ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir namaste.
Executive: Hello Shubham ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Sir good afternoon mera naam Saransh hai IndiaMART ke head office se business manager baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Haan Saransh ji main Shubham Dwivedi bol raha hu Gorakhpur se Raghvani Interior Designer mera firm hai.
Executive: Sorry sir maine.
Customer: Raghvni Interior Designer meri firm hai.
Executive: Haan haan ji listed hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji to main actually list kiya tha main business ke liye but by leads aur jo bhi aur kuch bhi unhone promise kiya tha kuch abhi aa nahi raha hai maine bhi bahut din se usko follow karna band kar diya starting mein maine.
Executive: Aap mujhe batayenge ki kya kya promise kiya gaya tha so that main uske basis pe action le saku.
Customer: Mujhe bola gaya tha ki business achcha aayega aapke paas calls aayenge till date mere paas ek bhi call nahi aaya products unhone kaha tha maine products kaafi us pe wo kiye hain.
Customer: Aur in fact jo by leads maine try bhi ki to wo kind of matlab fake thi us tarike se keh sakte hain aap.
Executive: To aapne inhe call kiya tha jinhone aapko sell out kiye the ek baar ki aapne jo bola wo cheez nahi mila mujhe.
Customer: Nahi nahi actually mujhe Surjan Lal ji se hi meri baat hui thi.
Customer: To unhone kaha ki sir abhi aap kuch din aur reh ke dekhiye try kijiye aisa kijiye vaisa kijiye mujhe productive agar abhi nahi lag raha hai to main apna time usme kyu waste karunga dekhiye sir main aapko PLI batana chahunga jis product industry mein aap log deal kar rahe hain waha pe competition bahut jyada hai.
Executive: Is wajah se kya ho raha hai ki matlab jo leads vagaira aap logo ke paas aa rahe hain right usi tarah ke leads sab logo ke paas hai aapke abhi kya hota hai ek hi buyer ko jab 10 log approach karte hain right to waha pe kahin na kahin conversion ki probability jo hai kam ho jati hai competition badh jata hai jaise main agar dekh raha hu aapka jo main product hai jaise ki aluminium sliding windows product hai.
Executive: Isme IndiaMART ke paas 15000 by leads hain lekin aapne is product ki kuch bhi by lead consume nahi kari right stainless steel glass railing hai uski 4709 by lead available hai.
Executive: Matlab pure saal mein right but iska consumption hai stainless steel railing ke sirf do by lead ki consumption hai right agar aapko matlab platform ko just ek wo visibility rakhna hai right to definitely aap isko rakh sakte hain but agar aap expect kare ki conversion right conversion ki guarantee IndiaMART kisi bhi basis pe nahi deta sir kyuki jo ye product industry jisme aap deal kar rahe hain right isme bahut sari cheeze matter karti hai ki product kya hai quality kya hai price kya chal raha hai customer kaha se hai kitna bulk quantity hai right aur aapka usse kya discuss ho raha hai ki nahi ho raha hai hai na to conversion ki surety hum nahi sakte isme baki aap bataye agar aapko aisa lagta hai ki continue nahi karna hai.
Customer: I guess mere liye abhi better nahi hai ye.
Executive: Better rahega to fir aap mujhe ek kaam kijiye ga registered mail id se please drop me mail.
Customer: Pardon fir se boliye ga thoda wo jo jo bhi isme wo mention kijiye ga.
Customer: Okay mail pe kaha pe?
Executive: Main mail id aapko provide karwa de raha hu us pe aur aap mujhe mail bhejiye ga regarding this to fir main jo sales team jinhone aapko coordinate right unse main aapki ek baar baat kara dunga actually kya hai ki hamara jo refund ka protocol hai right on the basis of maturity hum log refund allow nahi karte to iska mujhe approval wo bolna padega.
Executive: Approval permission lena padega agar mujhe permission mili to main shayad iska refund ke liye aapka try kar dunga matlab main aapke mail ke basis pe ek baar aage ja sakta hu but I am not sure ki mujhe refund ka permission milega ki nahi in case agar permission mila to main definitely aapka refund process kara paunga agar nahi mila to wo nahi ho payega thik hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Main aapko mail id dilwa deta hu Govind se aap ek mail dalana thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Govind.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Ji.
Executive: Haan ji Shubham sir main aapko bhej deta hu mail id hai na aap bhej dena jo sir ne kaha aapko.
Executive: Thik hai thank you sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received promised business/leads.

- Feels the byleads were fake.

- Wants a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the high competition in the industry.

- Executive mentioned conversion guarantee not provided by IndiaMART.

- Executive will provide email to customer for refund request.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send an email with details.

- Executive will seek refund approval.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, competition
